extraction.title: Settings freeze
extraction.description: Settings intent freezes, when trying to opening in 0.5.03. Also after reinstall
extraction.comments: Is this still a thing with 0.5.04 from the Play Beta? I don't know what "settings intent freezes" means, but I've had no issues with preferences, if that's what it means, in 0.5.04. :) also fixed for me Fixed in 0.5.04
